704154f-a.title: Brooklyn: Evergreen Avenue - Grove Street
704154f-a.text:
Evergreen Ave., north side, at and east of Grove Street, showing a
section of the Frank Ibert Brewery Co., established in 1891-1892, which was
partially destroyed by fire on June 24, 1925.
1924.
Eugene L. Armbruster Collection.
MAY BE REPRODUCED.
